bug.author: mawah
bug.summary: [BUG] Link to "notebooks" is broken in SETUP.md
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
At the end of the "Installation" section (before the pip install subsection), there is a link to the notebooks in the repository: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/ComputerVision/blob/master/SETUP.md#scenarios>https://github.com/microsoft/ComputerVision/blob/master/SETUP.md#scenarios</denchmark-link> . However, there is no "scenarios" section in SETUP.md so the link fails. <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
All. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
Click that link in SETUP.md. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
Add a relevant section to SETUP.md, or give a recommendation on where to begin with the notebooks (like a link to a specific file). <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Thanks. Fixed this now in a PR, and will go into staging/master soon.
